item.title: Take Action: Slow the Speed, Stop the Carnage
item.description: Demand immediate action to reduce traffic violence in NYC by lowering the citywide speed limit to 20 mph and protecting life-saving speed cameras.

item.title: About the Count of Crashes
item.description: The slow-motion catastrophe of traffic violence in New York City.

item.title: New York's Streets are a war zone
item.description: If a plane crashed in Times Square every month, we’d shut the skies down. But traffic violence quietly claims lives every week. The Count of Crashes documents the human cost—no spin, no excuses, just the blunt truth.
